hero.title: DARE Framework
hero.subtitle: Design AI Reliable Engagement
hero.description: A collaborative framework for responsible and effective AI integration in design processes.

about.title: About DARE
about.description: The DARE Framework establishes six levels of AI adoption in design, guiding teams on how to integrate artificial intelligence tools ethically and productively.

framework.title: Framework Levels
framework.description: Six progressive levels of AI integration in design, from fully manual approaches to advanced automation — each with its appropriate use cases.

metrics.title: Evolutionary metrics
metrics.heading: Framework Evolution
metrics.description: The progressive integration of AI in design processes and its impacts on key metrics

contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.subtitle: Help improve the framework
contribute.creatorDesc: Gui Gonzalez is a designer passionate about processes, who seeks to incorporate AI in a healthy way in the Design market, so that a new design emerges along with paradigm shifts.
contribute.translateDesc: Help make DARE accessible to designers around the world by contributing translations of the framework to different languages.

guidelines.title: Contribution Guidelines
guidelines.license: The DARE Framework is released under the Creative Commons BY-SA License, allowing free sharing and adaptation with proper attribution.
guidelines.step2: Create a branch for your contribution
guidelines.step3: Make your changes following our code and documentation standards
guidelines.step4: Submit a pull request with a clear description of the changes
guidelines.codeOfConduct: All contributors must follow our Code of Conduct, which promotes an inclusive and welcoming environment.

footer.description: A collaborative framework for responsible and effective AI integration in design processes.
footer.creator: Gui Gonzalez
